Class ShelfmarkNormalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • unidue.ub.statistics.maps.ShelfmarkNormalizer

  • public class ShelfmarkNormalizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Normalizes shelfmarks so that they become comparable and can be sorted
    Author:
    Frank Lützenkirchen
